string.text: Provide an item for the technician to salvage parts from.
The technician isn't interested in these parts.
Give to the technician for salvaging? This may reduce the cost of repairing another similar item.
The technician is ready to buy this item from you. Would you like to sell it for parts?
The technician doesn't have enough parts to fix this.
You can reduce the cost of this repair by providing similar items for salvaging.
